app_detail:
Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream is the special theme for girl with cute girly wallpapers! Go to download Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream to make your phone a cute & girlish look! 

Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream is packed with cute cartoon wallpaper, cute girly apps icon and cute cartoon icon pack! The Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream is the free girl theme for free, specially designed for Samsung, Huawei and any other brands of Android mobile stylish that giving your phone a smooth design and less buttery consumption.

Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream will apply you:Â 

âœ”ï¸High quality cute girly wallpapers specially designed for girlâ€™s phone
âœ”ï¸Cartoon cute icon pack and apps icon
âœ”ï¸Cool 3D transition effects.

How to apply the Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream ?Â 

To apply the cartoon theme for girl, please install our Launcher first. Apply the Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream, to make your phone faster, orderly and cool & cute. The original app icons, clock and weather theme of your phone will be replaced by the Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream. We have designed many customized themes for popular apps, these include camera apps, social apps, entertainment apps, useful tools and messenger apps. There are thousands of themes waiting for you in our launcher, namely pink theme, black theme, game theme, cartoon theme, anime themes, girly wallpaper theme and many more. All of our beautiful themes are free and available at Google Play Store. Download and apply Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream now! 

ğŸŒ¹What more you can enjoy for Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream? 

âœ¨Live Wallpapers:
- Different live wallpapers, including the cute live wallpapers, gold glitter live wallpapers, live wallpaper for girlâ€¦. and many more.Â 
- Choose cute & girly wallpapers to make your home screen a girlish look.Â 

âœ¨Cartoon themes for girl:Â 
- Cartoon themes with girly wallpapers for girlâ€™s phone only.
- Cute girly wallpapers with a variety of touch gestures, so you can feel the beauty of Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream at your fingertips.
- More 3D themes and dynamic wallpapers with fluid 3D effects, experience today's cutting-edge technology.

âœ¨Other benefits:Â 
- Different variety of themes, girly wallpapers, emoji & GIFs, app icons and often updates.
- We provide special designs during festive periods, whether it's Christmas, Halloween and other holidays, we will have a theme for you and everyone, so you can feel the festive atmosphere that you love.
- Golden theme, pink theme, black themeâ€¦ You can choose one of your favorite color theme to express your emotion everyday.
- Like football, basketball and other sports? Find your favorite sports theme here, along with your favorite celebrities, cartoons, and anything else.
- Experience smooth 3D and HD themes and wallpapers regardless of what phone model you use.

Apply the Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream now, to make your phone faster and organized, and make your phone a brand new girlish look. The original app icons, clock and weather theme wallpaper of your phone will be replaced by the Cartoon Theme - Sweet Ice Cream.

For inquiries&suggestions, contact us atÂ feedback.launcher@gmail.com.
